ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former director and vice-president of Trump Management Inc., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 12735 in management fees income from Trump Management Inc., valued at $15,001 - $50,000. Value reported reflects bank account holding only. Additional Underlying Asset: management company - value not readily ascertainable. Location: Manhasset, NY. See attached schedule.
